content: विघातः {@--1@} Destruction, removing, warding off; क्रियादवानां मघवा विघातं <ls>Ki. 3. 52.</ls> {@--2@} Killing, slaying. {@--3@} An obstacle, impediment, interruption; opposition, prevention; क्रियाविघाताय कथं प्रवर्तसे <ls>R. 3. 44</ls>; अध्वरविघातशांतये <ls n="R.">11. 1.</ls> {@--4@} A blow, stroke. {@--5@} Abandoning, leaving.
